A

addControls() - Method in class Interface
Adds other controls to the user interface like a "step" button.

Adds all the registers to the interface.

B

bin2dec(int[]) - Static method in class Utilities
Converts a binary number to a decimal number taking input as an integer array as is standard in this simulator.

C

Creates load button for panel.
createStepButton() - Method in class Interface
Creates single step button for panel.
createStoreButton() - Method in class Interface
Creates store button for panel.

D

dec2bin(int, int) - Static method in class Utilities
Converts a decimal number to binary (as an array of integers each zero or one).

E

executeInstruction() - Method in class Simulator
Executes the instruction specified by the contents of the IR.

G

get(int) - Method in class Memory
Returns the value at address a.
getRegister(String) - Method in class Simulator
Returns the value of the register with name name.
giveInterface(Interface) - Method in class Simulator
Gives a reference to an interface object so that this simulator can update/notify the interface when changes occur and it can update accordingly.

I

incrementPC() - Method in class Simulator
Increments the PC.
Interface - Class in Unnamed Package
A graphical user interface for using the simulated computer
Interface(Simulator) - Constructor for class Interface
Constructs and opens an interface with a simulator ready to run with all registers and memory intially set to zero.

L

load() - Method in class Simulator
Loads from memory the contents at the address specified by the MAR into the MBR.

Memory - Class in Unnamed Package
Memory for the LOR simulator
Memory(int) - Constructor for class Memory
Creates an instance of memory of with size words initially with all words set to zero

R

registerCopy(int[], int[]) - Method in class Simulator
Copies the value from the from register to the to register.

S

set(int, int[]) - Method in class Memory
Sets the value at address a
Simulator - Class in Unnamed Package
The main class that simulates the operations of the computer
Simulator(int) - Constructor for class Simulator
Creates a simulator instance with memory of size size
step() - Method in class Simulator
Performs a single step of machine execution: executing the instruction in the IR.
store() - Method in class Simulator
Stores in memory the contents in MBR at the address specified by the MAR.

T

TestUtilities - Class in Unnamed Package
 
TestUtilities() - Constructor for class TestUtilities
 
toString() - Method in class Memory
Converts this memory instance into a readable string by showing a line for each nonzero location in memory and on that line showing the address and the contents.

Updates the display based on the values in the simulator S

Sets the register with name n to have the value v.
